00020 #include <iostream>
00021 
00022 #include <cppunit/ui/text/TestRunner.h> 
00023 #include <cppunit/TestCase.h>
00024 
00025 #include <rdkcore/geometry/utils.h>
00026 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00027 #define LOGGING_MODULE "test"
00028 #include <rdkcore/ns.h>
00029 
00030 using namespace RDK2;
00031 using namespace RDK2::Geometry;
00032 
00033 template<class T> 
00034 bool string2val2string(const std::string& s) {
00035     T v;
00036     if(!string2float(s, v)) {
00037         std::cout << "error: Cannot parse " << s << std::endl;
00038         return false;
00039     }
00040     std::string s2 = float2string(v);
00041     if(s != s2) {
00042         std::cout << "error: " << s << " != " << s2 << std::endl;
00043         return false;
00044     }
00045     std::cout << "s2v2s: " << s << " -> " << v << " -> " << s2 << std::endl;
00046     return true;
00047 }
00048 
00049 template<class T> 
00050 bool val2string2val(T v, T epsilon=1e-10) {
00051     std::string s = float2string(v);
00052     T v2;
00053     if(!string2float(s, v2)) {
00054         std::cout  << "error: " << "Cannot parse " << s << std::endl;
00055         return false;
00056     }
00057     if(!sameFloat(v,v2,epsilon)) {
00058         std::cout  << "error: " << v << " -> " << s << " -> " << v2 << std::endl;
00059         return false;
00060     }
00061     std::cout << "v2s2v: " << v << " -> " << s << " -> " << v2 << std::endl;
00062     return true;
00063 }
00064 
00065 template<class T> 
00066 class INFNANTest : public CppUnit::TestCase {
00067     void runTest() {
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(true);
00069         
00070         sameFloat<T>(.0, .0);
00071         
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sameFloat<T>(.0, .0));
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sameFloat<T>(.0, .0, 0.1));
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sameFloat<T>(.0, .1, 0.11));
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!sameFloat<T>(.0, .1, 0.09));
00076 
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sameFloat<T>(RDK_NAN, RDK_NAN));
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sameFloat<T>(RDK_NAN, RDK_NAN, 0.0));
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!sameFloat<T>(RDK_NAN, 2.0));
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!sameFloat<T>(2.0, RDK_NAN));
00081         
00082         T inf = (sizeof(T)==4) ? (T) RDK_INF32 : (T) RDK_INF64;
00083             
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!sameFloat<T>(inf, 2.0));
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!sameFloat<T>(2.0, inf));
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!sameFloat<T>(RDK_NAN, inf));
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!sameFloat<T>(inf, RDK_NAN));
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sameFloat<T>(inf, inf));
00089     
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(val2string2val<T>(RDK_NAN));
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(val2string2val<T>(inf));
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(val2string2val<T>(42));
00093 
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(string2val2string<T>("31"));
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(string2val2string<T>("0"));
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(string2val2string<T>(RDK_INF_STRING));
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(string2val2string<T>(RDK_NAN_STRING));
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!string2val2string<T>("okok"));
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!string2val2string<T>(""));
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(RDK_ISNAN(RDK_NAN));
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!RDK_ISNAN(inf));
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!RDK_ISINF(RDK_NAN));
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!RDK_ISNAN(12.0));
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!RDK_ISINF(13.0));
00105     }
00106 };
00107 
00108 int main() {    
00109     CppUnit::TextUi::TestRunner runner;
00110     runner.addTest( new INFNANTest<double>() );
00111     runner.addTest( new INFNANTest<float>() );
00112     bool wasSuccessful = runner.run( "", false );
00113     return !wasSuccessful;
00114 }
